Annotation.String: The action sets the values of AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration and AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration properties to zero.
This action sets the values of AccumulatedGPUContextUtilizationDuration and AccumulatedSMUtilizationDuration properties to zero.
The throttle reasons for this processor.
The property shall contain a list of throttle reasons for this processor.
The total duration of throttling caused by hardware violation of the processor since reset.
This property shall contain the total duration of throttling caused by hardware violation of the processor since reset.
The total duration of throttling caused by global software violation of the processor since reset.
This property shall contain the total duration of throttling caused by global software violation of the processor since reset.
The duration of the accumulated GPU context utilization.

This property shall contain the duration of the accumulated GPU context utilization. This value can accumulate only with the driver loaded, and is reset when an SBR reset, a fundamental reset, or after a ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters action. This property reports utilization duration up to approximately 49 days of activity and will roll over to zero.
The duration of the accumulated SM utilization.

This property shall contain the duration of the accumulated SM utilization. This value can accumulate only with the driver loaded, and is reset when an SBR reset, a fundamental reset, or after a ClearAccumulatedUtilizationCounters action. This property reports utilization duration up to approximately 49 days of activity and will roll over to zero.
Graphics engine activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain graphics engine activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
SM activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain SM activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
SM occupancy as a percentage.
This property shall contain SM occupancy as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the warps by the maximum warps.
Tensor core activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain tensor core activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
FP64 activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain FP64 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
FP32 activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain FP32 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
FP16 activity as a percentage.
This property shall contain FP16 activity as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
NvDec utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain NvDec utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
NvJPG utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain NvJPG utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
An array of NvDEC instance utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain an array of NvDEC instance utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
An array of NvJPG instance utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain an array of NvJPG instance utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
NvOFA utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain NvOFA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
The current bandwidth transferred on PCIe with protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on PCIe with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
The current bandwidth received on PCIe with protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on PCIe with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
The current bandwidth transferred on NVLink with protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on NVLink with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
The current bandwidth received on NVLink with protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on NVLink with protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
The current bandwidth transferred on NVLink without protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth transferred on NVLink without protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
The current bandwidth received on NVLink without protocol overhead.
This property shall contain the current bandwidth received on NVLink without protocol overhead in gigabit per second (Gbit/s).
Interger activity utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain Integer activity utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
DMMA utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain DMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
HMMA utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain HMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
IMMA utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain IMMA utilization as a percentage, which is calculated by dividing the active cycles by the total cycles.
The total number of bytes sent by the PCIe transmitter.
This property shall contain the total number of bytes sent by the PCIe transmitter.
The total number of bytes received by the PCIe receiver.
This property shall contain the total number of bytes received by the PCIe receiver.
The entity is operating at a full functional level at full speed
The entity is operating at a full functional level at reduced speed
The entity is operating at a degraded functional level
The value is within the range
The value is outside the range
The performance state
This property shall contain the performance state value for this resource.
The power break performance state
This property shall contain the power break performance state value for this resource.
The EDP violation state
This property shall contain the EDP violation state for this resource.
The memory spare channel presence state.
This property shall indicate memory spare channel is presence for this processor.
The memory page retirement count.
This property shall contain memory page retirement count.
The SM utilization utilization as a percentage.
This property shall contain the SM utilization of the processor as a percentage.
